income_messages:
From: c**************0@gmail.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2022-07-12 17:17:51
SUBJECT: Dear Beloved One,
Sent from: catherineafred00@gmail.com
Dear Beloved One,
I greet you in the name of God, it is true that this letter may come to you
as a surprise but nevertheless, I humbly ask you to give me your attention
and hear me well. My name is Mrs. Catherine Afred, I am 65 years old and I
am married to Mr. Williams Afred, and we were married for a period of (20)
twenty years before he died in 2019.
We were married for 20 years without a child and he died after a
brief illness and since his death I decided not to remarry due to
my religious belief and old age. When my late husband was alive
he deposited the sum of three million five hundred thousand Euros
(3.5 Million Euros) with a Bank here. Presently this money is still in
the custody of the Bank. Recently, my Doctor told me that I would not
last for the next four months due to my cancer illness.
Having known my condition I decided to donate this money to
churches, organizations or good people that will utilize this fund the way
I am going to instruct for a proper idea on how this fund would be used.
I want you to use this money for charity organizations, orphanages, widows
and other people that are in need. I took this decision because I don’t
have any child that will inherit this money. Moreover, my husband’s
relatives are not close to me since I developed cancer illness and it had
been their wish to see me dead so as to enable them to inherit my husband’s
wealth hence we have no Child. These people are not worthy of this
inheritance. This is why I am taking this decision to contact you and
donate this fund to you for the charity works. And 30% of this money will
be for your time and effort, while 70% goes to charities.
As soon as I receive your reply, I will give you the contact of the Bank
where this fund was deposited by my deceased husband before his sudden
death.
Any delay in your reply may give me room to look for another good person
for this same purpose. Please assure me that you will act accordingly as I
stated above.
Thanks and Remain blessed.
Yours Sister
Mrs. Catherine Afred
From: c**************0@gmail.com
To: wh28983@m**************p
Time: 2022-07-13 17:31:27
SUBJECT: Your sister in Christ Mrs. Catherine Afred
Dear in Christ,
Thanks for your kind mail and your pity concerning my situation. I am
writing from the hospital bed, I must say a very big thank to you for
your urgent reply to my mail, I want you to know that your mail have
brought life and smile to my face and I must say I am happy as I have
entered a right hand who will manage my money well and use it to do
the work of God.
Please, I am sorry for being a little late in replying to your mail.
Due to my condition here is getting me worried and the pain is too
much for me. My dearest I thank you so much for your concern and I
want you to know that I have made up my mind to offer you 30% of this
money for your time and effort, while 70% goes to charities after the
successful transfer of this fund to you
The attachments are my photos here in the hospital.
My dear I will not stop in thanking you for hearing the cry of the
less privilege and I am assuring you that you will not regret any help
or time you spent in the less privilege in the society. My dear please
i want you to keep this my contact with you very confidential till the
bank transfer the money into your account,Why is it because a lot of
evil people are in the world today searching whom they will destroy.
pease this is the hard earn money for me and my husband and i do not
want anything to happen to the fund till you use it as I have
instructed you, please i will like you to send to me the following:
(1)Your Full Names
(2) Age:
(3) Marital Status:
(4) Contact Address:
(5) Tell/Fax Number:
(6) Occupation:
(7) Sex:
(8) Your photo or id card copy
I want you to know that this fund is 100% risk free so don't have
double mind because I may say that contacting you is God direction. I
will be looking forward to hearing from you soon, So that i will
forward my bank your information and also send you the contact details
of the bank so that you will contact them to realize the money for you
to carry out my wish. Please pray for me every day so that my pains
will be erased. In my next mail I will send you all the information
you will need to get the money transfer to you.
Thanks and God bless you and your family.
Your sister in Christ
Mrs. Catherine Afred
From: c**************0@gmail.com
To: wh28983@m**************p
Time: 2022-07-13 17:38:48
SUBJECT: Re: Your sister in Christ Mrs. Catherine Afred
Kindly send me your below details so that i will forward it to the
bank for the transfer:
(1)Your Full Names
(2) Age:

(5) Tell/Fax Number:

outbound_messages:
From: wh28983@m**************p
To: c**************0@gmail.com
Time: 2022-07-12 17:17:54
SUBJECT: Re: Dear Beloved One,
 I'm sorry I've included the letter from your health advisors. The full contents of it are quite confusing.Mrs. Afred says that in order for business to be completed, you must be able to oversee the release of the funds to someoneHow can you be of assistance in this matter, unless you are being on refugee permit and or are suffering from cancer?Mr. Afred must live on in sterdam. don't understand why he hadn't addressed this point in any sort of detail.
Best,
Mary
From: wh28983@m**************p
To: c**************0@gmail.com
Time: 2022-07-13 17:35:11
SUBJECT: Re: Your sister in Christ Mrs. Catherine Afred
rireyI'm happy to see that you're having question and answer correctly. I'm afraid I'm not well advised on phone as result of my exorbitant weight and don't have one available as well. However, I'll discuss this with your personal adviser, who will be taking care of other items. Is there any particular they are unable or unwilling to reached?Sincerely,C.
Best,
Mary
From: wh28983@m**************p
To: c**************0@gmail.com
Time: 2022-07-13 17:40:11
SUBJECT: Re: Your sister in Christ Mrs. Catherine Afred
Hi Valiant, how nice to hear from you I've never was married before. was married before and I'm married now, so it's weird. Was your husband well? Was your husband well? was married as worked, but now had younger husband he was, of course, poor and selfish man. Was he, of course. Was he, of course.It's left me feeling very behind and with your new husband. I'll see about getting hold of him.
Best,
Mary

The full contents of it are quite confusing.Mrs. Afred says that in order for business to be completed, you must be able to oversee the release of the funds to someoneHow can you be of assistance in this matter, unless you are being on refugee permit and or are suffering from cancer?Mr. Afred must live on in sterdam. don't understand why he hadn't addressed this point in any sort of detail.

Mary
